attributes.action: Shop Doorway Water & Power Points for Homeless
attributes.additional_details:
We would like a law to be passed to provide  an electrical  power socket and a drinking water tap in every shop doorway to enable homeless people to have fresh drinking water and power for their electric kettle and an electric blanket.

This will help homeless people at night.

Additionally, one large cardboard box should be left behind at each shop when rubbish is being cleared.

Each homeless person should also be provided with a £20 Tesco/Asda/etc. voucher which is enough to buy an electric kettle and electric blanket.
